stimulusHtml: Assume that  myPair  is a properly declared and initialized  Pair  object that appears in a class other than  Pair.  Which of the following code segments will compile without error?

features.html:
Consider the following class declaration.

 

public class Pair
{
   private int x;
   private int y;
   
   public Pair(int x1, int y1)
   {
      x = x1;
      y = y1;
   }
   
   public int getX()
   {
      return x;
   }
}
